title: Media Modals
description: You'll find all types of Accordion which is both use for HTML, REACTJS and NEXTJS

body.raw: Preview Code ## Installation ```bash npm install framer-motion ``` ```tsx title="media-modal.tsx" import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { AnimatePresence, motion } from 'framer-motion' import { cn } from '@/lib/utils' import { useMediaQuery } from '@/hooks/use-media-query' interface IMediaModal { imgSrc?: string videoSrc?: string className?: string } export function MediaModal({ imgSrc, videoSrc, className }: IMediaModal) { const [isMediaModalOpen, setIsMediaModalOpen] = useState(false) const isDesktop = useMediaQuery('(min-width:768px)') useEffect(() => { if (isMediaModalOpen) { document.body.classList.add('overflow-hidden') } else { document.body.classList.remove('overflow-hidden') } const handleKeyDown = (event: KeyboardEvent) => { if (event.key === 'Escape') { setIsMediaModalOpen(false) } } document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown) return () => { document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown) } }, [isMediaModalOpen]) return ( <> {isMediaModalOpen !== false && ( { setIsMediaModalOpen(false) }} > {imgSrc! && ( isDesktop && e.stopPropagation()} layoutId={`img-${imgSrc}`} className={`" w-fit h-[80%] mx-auto ${ isDesktop ? ' cursor-default' : ' cursor-zoom-out' }`} > )} {videoSrc! && ( isDesktop && e.stopPropagation()} layoutId={`video-${videoSrc}`} className={`" w-fit h-[80%] mx-auto ${ isDesktop ? ' cursor-default' : ' cursor-zoom-out' }`} > )} )} {imgSrc! && ( { setIsMediaModalOpen(true) }} layoutId={`img-${imgSrc}`} className={cn('overflow-hidden w-full', className)} > )} {videoSrc! && ( { setIsMediaModalOpen(true) }} layoutId={`video-${videoSrc}`} className={cn('overflow-hidden w-full h-full', className)} > )} ) } ```
